label: Studio Soft Light
title: Studio Soft Light
description: Professional studio lighting with soft shadows and natural skin texture.
systemPrompt: Enhance image quality simulating 85mm lens. Softbox lighting, gentle highlight rolloff, natural skin texture preservation. Reduce noise, sharpen eyes. No artificial smoothing.

label: Golden Hour Glow
title: Golden Hour Glow
description: Warm, sun-kissed lighting typical of late afternoon photography.
systemPrompt: Simulate golden hour lighting. Warm color temperature (5500K), rim lighting on subject, soft bokeh background. Enhance dynamic range, preserve facial details.

label: Cinematic Teal
title: Cinematic Teal & Orange
description: Modern cinematic look with complementary color grading.
systemPrompt: Apply cinematic color grading. Teal shadows, orange skin tones. High contrast, dramatic lighting. Anamorphic lens simulation. Sharp focus on subject.

label: B&W Noir
title: B&W Noir
description: High contrast black and white with dramatic shadows.
systemPrompt: Black and white photography. High contrast, deep blacks, bright highlights. Film grain simulation (ISO 400). Dramatic lighting, emotional mood.

label: Vivid Landscape
title: Vivid Landscape
description: Punchy colors and high dynamic range for outdoor shots.
systemPrompt: Enhance landscape. Increase saturation and vibrance. High dynamic range (HDR). Sharpen foliage and textures. Clear blue skies, balanced exposure.

label: E-commerce Clean
title: E-commerce Clean
description: Bright, clean look suitable for product listings.
systemPrompt: Product photography style. Pure white lighting, high key. Sharp details, remove color casts. Neutral white balance. Focus stacking simulation.

label: Gourmet Food
title: Gourmet Food
description: Enhances textures and colors to make food look delicious.
systemPrompt: Food photography enhancement. Increase local contrast and clarity. Warm lighting. Enhance textures of food. Shallow depth of field (f/2.8).

label: Cyberpunk Night
title: Cyberpunk Night
description: Neon aesthetics for night cityscapes.
systemPrompt: Night photography. Cyberpunk aesthetic. Neon glow, deep blues and magentas. Reduce noise. Enhance light trails and reflections.

title: Macro Detail
description: Extreme detail enhancement for close-up shots.
systemPrompt: Macro photography simulation. Extreme sharpness on focal point. Creamy bokeh background. Enhance micro-contrast and textures.

title: Modern Architecture
description: Straight lines and balanced exposure for buildings.
systemPrompt: Architectural photography. Perspective correction (vertical lines). Balanced exposure for highlights and shadows. Cool, clean color palette.

title: High Fashion
description: Edgy, high-contrast look found in fashion magazines.
systemPrompt: Editorial fashion style. High contrast, edgy lighting. Muted colors with skin tone preservation. Sharp details on clothing textures.

title: Vintage Kodak
description: Nostalgic film look with warm tones.
systemPrompt: Simulate Kodak Portra 400 film. Warm tones, fine grain. Soft highlights, slightly lifted shadows. Nostalgic mood.

title: Vintage Fuji
description: Cooler, greener tones typical of Fujifilm.
systemPrompt: Simulate Fujifilm Pro 400H. Cool greens and cyans in shadows. Pastel highlights. Soft contrast. Airy feel.

title: Real Estate Interior
description: Bright and spacious look for interiors.
systemPrompt: Real estate interior photography. Wide angle lens simulation. Bright, even lighting. Window pull (balanced outdoor view). Neutral color temperature.

title: Beauty Retouch
description: Subtle enhancement for beauty shots.
systemPrompt: High-end beauty retouching. Even skin tone, reduce blemishes but keep texture. Brighten eyes, whiten teeth slightly. Soft, flattering lighting.

title: Oil Painting Style
description: Transforms the image into a realistic oil painting.
systemPrompt: Artistic style transfer. Oil painting technique. Visible brush strokes, rich textures. Impasto effect. Vibrant colors.

title: Watercolor Sketch
description: Soft, flowing watercolor aesthetic.
systemPrompt: Artistic style transfer. Watercolor painting. Soft edges, color bleeding, paper texture. Light and airy composition.

title: Rembrandt Lighting
description: Classic dramatic lighting with strong contrast.
systemPrompt: Rembrandt lighting simulation. Triangle of light on cheek. Dark background, moody atmosphere. High contrast.

title: Bright & Airy
description: Popular influencer style, bright and low contrast.
systemPrompt: Lifestyle photography. Bright and airy. Low contrast, high exposure. Pastel colors. Soft, diffused light.

title: Dark & Moody
description: Desaturated and shadowed for a moody vibe.
systemPrompt: Moody lifestyle photography. Underexposed, crushed blacks. Desaturated greens and blues. Rich, deep earth tones.

title: Travel Wanderlust
description: Enhances blues and greens for travel photos.
systemPrompt: Travel photography. Enhance blues (sky/water) and greens (nature). High clarity. Balanced exposure. Inviting atmosphere.

title: Pet Portrait
description: Specifically tuned to enhance fur texture.
systemPrompt: Pet photography. Enhance fur texture and detail. Sharp eyes. Fast shutter speed simulation (freeze motion). Natural lighting.

title: Car Showroom
description: Makes cars look shiny and metallic.
systemPrompt: Automotive photography. Enhance reflections and metallic paint. High contrast. Cool, industrial background tones. Sharp lines.

title: Fitness Gritty
description: High clarity to emphasize muscle definition.
systemPrompt: Fitness photography. High clarity and structure. Emphasize muscle definition. Gritty texture. Dramatic overhead lighting.

title: Concert Stage
description: Handles difficult stage lighting and noise.
systemPrompt: Concert photography. Handle mixed stage lighting. Reduce high ISO noise. Preserve atmosphere and fog effects. Sharp subject.

title: Street Documentary
description: Raw, authentic look for street photography.
systemPrompt: Street photography. 35mm lens simulation. Deep depth of field. Authentic colors, slightly gritty. Decisive moment focus.

title: Romantic Wedding
description: Soft, dreamy look for wedding shots.
systemPrompt: Wedding photography. Soft, romantic glow. Pastel color palette. Slightly overexposed highlights. Dreamy atmosphere.

title: Underwater Clarity
description: Removes blue cast and restores red tones.
systemPrompt: Underwater photography correction. Remove blue/green color cast. Restore red and orange tones. Increase clarity and visibility.

title: Astrophotography
description: Enhances stars and reduces sky noise.
systemPrompt: Astrophotography. Enhance star visibility. Reduce sky noise. Deep black sky. Highlight Milky Way details if present.

title: Old Photo Restore
description: Removes scratches and restores faded colors.
systemPrompt: Photo restoration. Remove scratches, dust, and tears. Restore faded colors to natural tones. Sharpen details. Remove sepia cast.
